params.localToken: Address of the token on the this domain.
params.remoteToken: Address of the token on the remote domain.

params._bridge: Address of the ERC721 bridge on this network.

params._remoteToken: Address of the corresponding token on the other domain.

params._bridge: Address of the ERC721 bridge on this network.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

OptimismMintableERC721Created(address,ad.notice: Emitted whenever a new OptimismMintableERC721 contract is created.

bridge().notice: Address of the ERC721 bridge on this network.

createStandardOptimismMintableERC721(add.notice: Creates an instance of the standard ERC721.

isStandardOptimismMintableERC721(address.notice: Tracks addresses created by this factory.

remoteChainId().notice: Chain ID for the remote network.

userdoc.notice: Factory contract for creating OptimismMintableERC721 contracts.
